item.title: CVE-2024-35762|2024-06-21T12:35:55.666Z -- cryout%20creations -- serious%20slider
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Cryout Creations Serious Slider allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Serious Slider: from n/a through 1.2.4.
